data.title: Amazon.com: The Greatest Generation: 9780812975291: Brokaw, Tom: Books
data.meta_description: Amazon.com: The Greatest Generation: 9780812975291: Brokaw, Tom: Books
data.text:
Customers find the writing quality marvelous, tough, and outstanding. They also say the book is nostalgic and prophetic, revealing the void and selflessness, sacrifice, and modesty that marks the generation.

"...A great read for those that had relatives from this generation that served and did not like to talk about it...." Read more

"...It was nostalgic while at the same time prophetic in revealing the void that could be left in our country if we donâ€™t heed the examples of faith, of..." Read more

Customers find the book inspirational, capturing a true sense of the struggles and unification of America during WWII. They also say the stories are packed with folks who exude determination, grit, duty, and love for their country. Readers also say it's a magnificent lesson in personal responsibility, giving a real sense of all the sacrifices made. They mention it makes them proud to be an American and an Army veteran.

"...These are fascinating stories and allow the reader to visualize the problems these minorities faced and how they overcame adversity...." Read more

"This book was very well written and contained many good anecdotes about those who - and I agree with Brokaw - were of the "Greatest Generation"...." Read more

"...True, he is not the best writer. But I did not let that limit my emotional attachment to the sacrifices made for some of these people...." Read more

"This book was very well written and contained many good anecdotes about those who - and I agree with Brokaw - were of the "Greatest Generation"...." Read more

"...The war is much more interesting, and is the basis for the book, so why skip it?..." Read more

"...The stories are personal, told at that intimate level at which the veterans I knew related their experiences to me...." Read more

Customers find the stories in the book incredible, well-written, and told by a seasoned communicator. They also say it's a great read about great Americans and unsung heroes. Customers also say the book is a masterful piece and very humbling.

"...So I ordered it from Amazon and am so glad I did. It is a wonderful testimony to the American way of life that did so much..." Read more

Readers find the book about the Greatest Generation a great tribute to the generation. They also say it makes the holiday much more meaningful and makes a good gift for history buffs.

"...All in all The Greatest Generation is a good read and a view into the mindset of a generation which has all but disappeared." Read more

"This is a wonderful book and provides a better understanding of that generation, the generation of my Dad, my father-in-law, and so many people I..." Read more
